rules.ruleString: (Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {LAW3300, LAW3301} and  Incompatible with course version in {0061, 0080, 0082, 0086, 0094, 0546, 1074, 1497, 2317, 2708} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})
Any co-req (I/W) unit in {LAW1100, LAW1101, LAW1111}

description: The unit introduces the general doctrines, principles and aims of the criminal law and criminal justice system, introduces the roles of civil and criminal laws in relation to harms to the person, and examines the law relating to fatal and non-fatal offences against people. It analyses sentencing and access to compensation for victims of crime.
